tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE public_hearings (
  hearing_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  hearing_title VARCHAR(255),
  hearing_date DATE,
  legislation_id UUID,
  comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE public_hearings ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    date DATE, 
    description TEXT, 
    location VARCHAR(255), 
    legislation_id INT 
);

CREATE TABLE town_hall_meetings ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    date DATE, 
    description TEXT, 
    location VARCHAR(255), 
    legislation_id INT 
);

CREATE TABLE legislation (
	legislation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	legislation_title VARCHAR(255),
	legislation_type VARCHAR(50),
	legislation_status VARCHAR(50),
	proposed_date DATE
);
